collection:
This Privacy Policy explains how
we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our
API.

### Information Collection

Our API collects information in the following ways: Uploaded Documents: When
users upload documents (resumes) to our '/search_by_resume_text' endpoint, we
only recieve the text of the document, and not the document itself.

Form Data: We collect form
data submitted to our '/search_by_category_location' endpoint, including
category and location information.

Server Logs: Our servers automatically
collect information when our API is accessed, including IP addresses, browser
types, and access times.

### Use of Information

The information collected through our API is used for the following purposes:
To Provide Services: To match resumes with job listings and respond to user
queries.

### Children's Privacy

Our API is not intended for individuals under the age of 13, and we do not
knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

This Privacy Policy explains how
we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our
API.

### Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable
information to outside parties, except as required by law.
